Generation I.Red: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.
Generation I.Yellow: A Pok é mon with a friendly nature. However, it will bark fiercely at anything invading its territory.
Generation I.Stadium: Friendly and loyal, but also jealously protective of its territory. Carelessly approaching it may result in a bite.

Generation II.Gold: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
Generation II.Silver: Extremely loyal, it will fearlessly bark at any opponent to protect its own trainer from harm.
Generation II.Crystal: It controls a big territory. If it detects an unknown smell, it roars loudly to force out the intruder.
Generation II.Stadium 2: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) Extremely loyal, it will fearlessly bark at any opponent to protect its own trainer from harm. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Growlithe has a superb sense of smell. Once it smells anything, this Pok é mon won't forget the scent, no matter what. It uses its advanced olfactory sense to determine the emotions of other living things.
Generation III.Sapphire: Growlithe has a superb sense of smell. Once it smells anything, this Pok é mon won't forget the scent, no matter what. It uses its advanced olfactory sense to determine the emotions of other living things.
Generation III.Emerald: Its superb sense of smell ensures that this Pok é mon won't forget any scent, no matter what. It uses its sense of smell to detect the emotions of others.
Generation III.FireRed: Very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It is very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

Generation VI.X: Very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.

Generation VII.Sun: It's both clever and loyal, but if a stranger tries to invade its territory, it barks threateningly.
Generation VII.Moon: It looks cute, but when you approach another Trainer's Growlithe, it will bark at you and bite.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: While it's quite friendly toward humans once it's grown used to them, in the wild it must be quite fierce to defend its territory from Rockruff.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It has lived alongside humans since ages ago. Its bones have been found in excavations of ruins from the Stone Age.
Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: A Pokémon with a friendly nature. However, it will bark fiercely at anything invading its territory.

Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: They patrol their territory in pairs. I believe the igneous rock components in the fur of this species are the result of volcanic activity in its habitat.
